alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama, Jackson and northeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Miller, southwestern Calhoun, northern Seminole and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 418 PM EDT/318 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Arlington to near Colquitt to 9 miles northeast of Marianna. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Chipley, Donalsonville, Blakely, Marianna, Arlington, Douglasville, Centerville, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Jakin, Bascom, Crosby, Grangeburg and Parksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
